Title: Remembrance
Writer: Pamela Katz (screenplay), Anna Justice (collaborator on screenplay), Pamela Katz
Actors: Alice Dwyer, Dagmar Manzel, Mateusz Damiecki, Susanne Lothar
Plot: Die Verlorene Zeit (Remembrance) depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of...
